title: On Justice by Plato
description: On Justice (Greek: ΠΕΡΙ ΔΙΚΑΙΟΥ; Latin: De Justo) may not have been written by Plato. In this five page dialogue Socrates asks his friend if the unjust choose to be wicked or are bad though ignorance. Triptych: The Garden of Earthly Delights by Hieronymus Bosch, c. 1510.
content:encoded: On Justice (Greek: ΠΕΡΙ ΔΙΚΑΙΟΥ; Latin: De Justo) may not have been written by Plato. In this five page dialogue Socrates asks his friend if the unjust choose to be wicked or are bad though ignorance. Triptych: The Garden of Earthly Delights by Hieronymus Bosch, c. 1510.
